copies.consentText: Allows us to provide services, detect fraud, generate aggregated statistics, and support internal operations.

copies.consentName: Help develop our products and services
copies.consentText: Allows us to optimize performance and quality based on usage patterns, and provide new and improved offerings.
Allows us to create customized offers and promotional content for you based on your usage data.

richText:
The usage data we collect helps us understand how you use our products, what information you might be interested in, and what we can improve to make your engagement with Autodesk more rewarding.

Manage your privacy settings here or at any time in your profile. To learn more, see our analytics programs page and Privacy Statement.
subtitle: We care about your privacy
title: Privacy Settings
